meanings.definition: Acting to modify or regulate the immune system.
meanings.sent1: The immunomodulatory treatment helped balance my immune system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying the effects of immunomodulatory drugs on patients.
meanings.sent3: The immunomodulatory soup recipe promised to regulate taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an immunomodulatory wave, calming everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The immunomodulatory music soothed the chaotic crowd.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to alter immune responses.
meanings.sent1: The immunomodulatory herbs boosted my body's defenses.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring the immunomodulatory properties of certain foods.
meanings.sent3: The immunomodulatory cat toy seemed to change the feline's playfulness.
meanings.sent4: His words had an immunomodulatory effect on the team, motivating them to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The immunomodulatory scent of flowers filled the room with a sense of protection.
